lead_paragraph: ADES--Robert J. The Yeshiva University family is deeply grieved by the passing of Robert J. Ades, cherished son of revered YU Trustee Joseph (and Rachel) Ades, of blessed memory, Yeshiva University Benefactors, and the beloved husband of Esther Kassin Ades, a former member of the Board of Directors of the Yeshiva University High Schools and the admired brother of Albert J. Ades, a member of the Yeshiva College Board of Overseers and a co-trustee of the Ades Foundation Inc. with Robert J. Ades, which provides annual support for the Joseph and Rachel Ades Sephardic Outreach Program, the Joseph and Rachel Ades Chair in Health Sciences, and Scholarship aid for deserving and needy students, and brother of their lovely sister, Renee (and Stephen) Levy, scholarship donors for deserving and needy Sephardic students in our undergraduate schools. Heartfelt condolences are extended to Esther Ades, Albert (and Sylvia) Ades, Renee (and Stephen) Levy, her children, Dr. Joseph (and Deborah), Michael (and Lisa), David (and Elana) and Billy (and Aileen), and her 10 grandchildren, and to all of her family's nieces and nephews and their progeny. These are difficult times for Esther Ades, whose revered mother, Selma Kassin, Z"I, passed away in January. May the Almighty grant His healing solace to all the bereaved members of this significant and appreciated Yeshiva University family and to all who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Min hashamayim tenuhamu! Richard M. Joel, President, Yeshiva University Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3
